name: RewardsDistributor
description: RewardsDistributor. RewardsDistributor allows Fund Managers to send rewards (usually in MTA) to specified Reward Recipients.

eventDecorators.name: DistributedReward
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when a vault is liquidated.

eventDecorators.name: RemovedFundManager
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when a vault is liquidated.

eventDecorators.name: Whitelisted
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when a vault is liquidated.

functionDecorators.name: addFundManager
functionDecorators.description: Allows the mStable governance to add a new FundManager.

functionDecorators.name: distributeRewards
functionDecorators.description: Distributes reward tokens to list of recipients and notifies them of the transfer. Only callable by FundManagers.

parameterDecorators.name: _recipients
parameterDecorators.description: Array of Reward recipients to credit.

parameterDecorators.name: _amounts
parameterDecorators.description: Amounts of reward tokens to distribute.

functionDecorators.name: removeFundManager
functionDecorators.description: Allows the mStable governance to remove inactive FundManagers.
